remarks: Sufficient condition for elementhood in the set of polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
statement:
elplyr $p |- ( ( S C_ CC /\ N e. NN0 /\ A : NN0 --> S ) -> ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ( ( A ` k ) x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
$d A k z $.
$d N k z $.
$d S k z $.
$d k z $.
$d k z $.
